_*Q: I have installed the program, but after checking a VM it won't start automatic*_<br>
_A: Try to put the following global environment variable VBOX_USER_HOME=<path to your virtualbox.xml>\_<br>
<br>
_*Q: If i try to install the service with the switch -install, it gives an error*_<br>
_A: If you have downloaded the setup it will do this automatic during setup_<br>
